data.title: French Community Leaders Say Jewish Agency Declarations Are Harmful
data.meta_description: French Prime Minister Jean Pierre Raffarin Was Seated at the Hospital Bedside of Yisrael Yifrah a Few Days Ago, Two Days After Yifrah Had Been Stabbed in His North Paris Neighborhood by a Muslim Man Who Punctuated the Act With the Cry "Allahu Akhbar."
